sentences.en: "I will put my heart and soul into the job," he promises.
sentences.cn: “我会全身心投入到工作中去，”他保证说。

sentences.en: According to Mandy, Pat's tough exterior hides a shy and sensitive soul.
sentences.cn: 据曼迪说，帕特彪悍的外表下隐藏着一颗害羞且敏感的心。

sentences.en: He dedicated himself body and soul to the education of young men.
sentences.cn: 他全身心地投入到年轻人的教育中。

sentences.en: He ignores the traditional Christian dualism between body and soul.
sentences.cn: 他无视传统基督教的肉体与灵魂的二元论。

sentences.en: Heaven will take you back and look at you and say, "Only one thing can make a soul complete—and that thing is love."
sentences.cn: 上天会把你带走，看着你，对你说，只有一件事可以让灵魂完整，那就是爱。

sentences.en: Her mother, poor soul, came to an even worse end.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲，那个可怜的人，结局更糟糕。

sentences.en: I've never harmed a soul in my life.
sentences.cn: 我这一生从未伤害过任何人。

sentences.en: It was as if those grey eyes could see into the very depths of her soul .
sentences.cn: 仿佛那双灰眼睛能看到她的灵魂深处。

sentences.en: She was now committed to the band, body and soul.
sentences.cn: 现在，她把全部心思都放到了乐队上面。

sentences.en: She went to pray for the soul of her late husband.
sentences.cn: 她去为亡夫的灵魂祈祷。

sentences.en: Steve and I became soul mates, near-constant companions.
sentences.cn: 我和史蒂夫成了知己，几乎时刻相伴。

sentences.en: The associative guilt was ingrained in his soul.
sentences.cn: 由此产生的内疚感在他灵魂深处挥之不去。

sentences.en: The Greeks accepted belief in the immortality of the soul.
The place is balm to the soul.
sentences.cn: 这个地方能给灵魂带来慰藉。

sentences.en: They have started showing a strong soul element in their sound.
sentences.cn: 他们的音乐风格开始表现出一种强烈的灵乐特色。

phrases.phrase: the life and soul of the party

trans.tran_en: the part of a person that is not physical, and that contains their character, thoughts, and feelings. Many people believe that a person’s soul continues to exist after they have died.
